    • Method Detail

      • readProperties

        public Configuration readProperties()
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    InvalidPropertiesException
        Reads the properties file, looking for the following properties: - User mode (subscriber/publisher). - Socket mode (default only for the moment). - Topic list. - Port. - Multicast IP. Then, every property is checked to ensure that they are correctly defined. And, if yes, a Configuration object that holds the read information is created and returned.
        Returns:
        Configuration The configuration object with the read properties.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an exception occurs reading the properties file.
        InvalidPropertiesException - If any of the properties is not correctly defined.

      • parseTopics

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> parseTopics(java.lang.String readTopics)
        Creates a list of topics, from the string with the topics separated by commas read from the properties file. Before splitting the string, the whitespaces are removed, just in case.
        Parameters:
        readTopics - The topics string separated by comma read from properties file.
        Returns:
        ArrayList\ A list with all the topics.
